oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Spirit of the Farm breeder's directory
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Periodicals; Farming; Livestock
Agriculture
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Breeders' directory for various types of livestock. Information includes name of farm and description of livestock.

"The Spirit of the Farm," a weekly journal devoted to agriculture and livestock, was published in Nashville from 1883 to 1886. The editor was B. M. Hord. This journal is a typical Progressive-era farm publication.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Spirit of the Farm Publishing Company
